meanings.definition: A board displaying information or advertisements
meanings.sent1: The signboard outside the store showed the opening hours.
meanings.sent2: I saw a signboard with a picture of a delicious burger.
meanings.sent3: The signboard seemed to wink at me as I walked by.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bright signboard in a dark alley.
meanings.sent5: The neon signboard lit up the street with its colorful glow.

meanings.definition: To display information or advertisements on a board
meanings.sent1: They will signboard the event details on the notice board.
meanings.sent2: We need to signboard the new rules for everyone to see.
meanings.sent3: The students decided to signboard their project ideas on a big poster.
meanings.sent4: She signboards her artwork on the walls of the art gallery.
meanings.sent5: The company will signboard their products at the upcoming trade show.
